name: Blackberry
description:
Psychological horror, the action of which takes place in the depths of the mind of the protagonist. Over and over again childhood fears emerge from the subconscious in an adult guise, which is more and more difficult to resist each time. The hero finds himself in the forestry of his dead father, not losing his mind in which it turns out to be a very difficult task. Along with the growing chaos in the character's head, a mysterious image of a girl begins to appear to him, calling herself "blackberry" of the dense forests of his consciousness and awaiting the player at every turn. Not everyone can understand who she is and what she needs. Exactly how not everyone can, until the end of the game, open the contents of the mysterious forbidden envelope, fraught with a fateful prediction for the main character and an explanation of what is happening around. How long the journey into the depths of the mind drags on is up to you.
In the game you have to:
- in a gloomy and tense atmosphere to solve various tasks and puzzles, including saving your life;
- gradually plunge into the essence of what is happening, discovering new levels and testing nerves for strength;
- find out the main secret of the black berry - open the contents of the mysterious envelope with its prophecy.
- bonus survival levels available after completing the main storyline.
The game contains several endings. Choose the best course of events for yourself, but most importantly stay alive!
